verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to the Sheminith. A Psalm of David. <S%H3467>Help<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For the godly <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1584>ceaseth<s%>; For the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6461>fail<s%> from among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.

They <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7723>falsehood<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>: With <S%H2513>flattering<s%> <S%H8193>lip<s%>, and with a <S%H3820>double<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, do they <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all <S%H2513>flattering<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>, The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> that <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> great <S%H1419>things<s%>;
Who have <S%H559>said<s%>, With our <S%H3956>tongue<s%> will we <S%H1396>prevail<s%>; Our <S%H8193>lips<s%> are our <S%H113>own<s%>: Who is lord over us?

Because of the <S%H7701>oppression<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%>, because of the <S%H603>sighing<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%>, Now will I <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; I will <S%H7896>set<s%> him in the <S%H3468>safety<s%> he panteth <S%H6315>for<s%>.

The <S%H565>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> are <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H565>words<s%>; As <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H6884>tried<s%> in a <S%H5948>furnace<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H2212>Purified<s%> seven <S%H7659>times<s%>.
Thou wilt <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, O Jehovah, Thou wilt <S%H5341>preserve<s%> them from <S%H2098>this<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, When <S%H2149>vileness<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted<s%> among the sons of <S%H1121>men<s%>.
